response:
Dear [Company Name],

I am writing to express my disappointment with the recent experience I had with your company regarding a product I purchased from your online store. I have been a loyal customer for several years, and I have always appreciated your commitment to customer satisfaction. However, I am writing to you today to address a concern that has left me feeling frustrated and dissatisfied.

I recently purchased a [product name] from your online store, and upon receiving it, I discovered that it did not meet my expectations. I contacted your customer service department to request a refund, but unfortunately, my request was denied. I was informed that your company's policy does not allow for refunds on products that have been opened or used.

I understand that your company has policies in place to protect your business, but I believe that this policy is unfair and unreasonable. I purchased the product with the expectation that it would meet my needs and that I would be satisfied with my purchase. However, I was disappointed to find that it did not meet my expectations, and I feel that I am entitled to a refund.

I would appreciate it if you could review my case and reconsider your decision to deny my refund request. I believe that this is a fair request, and I hope that you will take the time to review my situation and make a decision that is in the best interest of your customers.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
